description:
The basic support to be able to login to a organisation which mandates a 2FA key is not supported in this snap. 

It's is only avaliable through the web version. 

I can't give the package anything other than a 1 star review if I can't even login.
Very surprised by how well it works

App consume to much cpu(50% and more) and constant reboots during work. 
system configuration: 
ubuntu 20.04 LTS
Proc intell core i5 10Th Gen
No support for external webcam on laptop
summary: No support for external webcam on laptop

description: Reverted to the Electron based version, which worked first timer.
summary: Would not pick up external Logitech microphone

description: Appart of the usual complains about Teams in general (regardless of the client), this one doesn't let me share my screen.
consume to much cpu

I had problems with the camera in the preview version. 
I switched to the Microsoft Teams - Insiders and now the
The microphone does not work.
Sound/video seems to be OK.
Great feature parity with Windows version.
Calling & Screen Sharing doesn't work on ubuntu
summary: Calling & Screen Sharing doesn't work on ubuntu

description:
It's my main driver however there are many reliability issues.

Some calls, users can't hear me. Need to switch to browser teams and back to this teams.
Rather high CPU usage
Teams window flickers during calls. Rather annoying.
Can't join meetings: "Can't establish..."
summary: Main driver however there are reliability issues

description: Please port MS Office next (and improve its support for ODF)
You can only see 4 vidoes. You can not pop out chats. Things that worked already better. There is no progress in getting a good build. Nothing is happending...
summary: Nearly every Teams feature is missing, the rest is working bad

description: unable to login on ubuntu 20
Cannot login using my university email

With the budget of Microsoft you would think they could make software that works. This is plagued with audio/microphone issues. You have to call to test your audio devices and can't just test them directly.
Don't know why it doesn't work, also when I use the link sent by others Teams will not work.
Installed on Ubuntu 20.04 on Feb 10, 2021 and haven't hit a glitch yet.
bad. Application does not work on ubuntu 20.04 LTS

I was facing screensharing and audio related issues on the chrome browser as well as on the Teams app (tried both Insider and Preview versions) like many others had posted - black screen for viewers when sharing the entire screen in the browser, and no screensharing option except for PPT when sharing from the Teams app. 

It turns out, it is because I was using "Ubuntu on Wayland" on Ubuntu 20.04 while logging in. Switching to "Ubuntu" fixed many of these issues. Will change my rating from 4* to 5* after using this software for a week or so if things are smooth.
summary: Works as intended with a caveat

description:
Does not support sharing of a single window, browser tab or a part of the screen. I have a big screen. If I share my entire screen every thing is tiny and blurred.
The app also doesn't support changing the web cam backround or blurring the backround. 
If those two features are added I will give 4 or 5 stars!
Everything works as expected. One thing I would like to see added is the ability to request and/or give control via the Linux app. Right now it seems it is simply not available.
the latest revision introduce a bug, that avoid sharing to prresent the desktop
summary: when sharing desktop, it quits the application

description:
this is the worst app, its so slow and crashes all the time
also you do not get all the features compared to what you get in windows
It woks faster than in windows in Linux Ubuntu

I couldn't connect to meetings with this app. 
But, Microsoft Teams worked well in 
* Chrome browser on Ubuntu 18.04, without having to download any app.
* sound, video, and sharing my screen all worked in browser version.
summary: Internet browser version worked better than this app

description: Can't change organizations
It crashes always when changing organization
Can't change organizations

Does not work; then I read cannot work on Linux!
Impossible to remove after installing, so do not install!!!
It is a stable and fast software. I would like for it to have the background capability of the Windows version. Besides that is excellent.
Every time I select an organization, it restarts and asks me again.
Cannot change organization, it crashes and goes back to the "default" one every time.
After entering credentials, the sign in prompt goes in a loop for 4 to 5 times, it fails and keep showing "Try again" screen.
summary: Not able to sign-in in Ubuntu 20.04.02

description: works as intended. Is very slow and uses lots of RAM just like windows10 MS teams.
It does what it should. But the fact that it autostarts on login by default is really bad. Fortunately you can disable this.
Impossible to use without any crash.
Restart all the time
Others have mentioned this, but it's a fatal flaw. I will use a web browser only, unfortunately.

It keeps on asking me to login and sign up but never successfully logs in....
This isn't the first time I've faced problems with microsoft sign in.
The current version doesn't seem to be supporting logins to a work account.
hidden share screen, plese fix in ubuntu 21.04 help
It worked until I rebooted today. After that it loops the login screen and never actually logs in. It was 4 star before today.

Every day when I resume my machine, microsoft Teams becomes transparent. I wish I could attach a screenshot. then I have to uninstall and reinstall it to use it. 

From browser, teams.microsoft.com it goes into an infinite loop of authenticating, then loading then error and repeat without any user intervention. it tries that almost three times and then it shows 

To open the web app, change your browser settings to allow third-party cookies or allow certain trusted domains. Try again. If that doesn't work, try signing out and back in.

It's a shame that it happens on latest Edge and not on firefox. I use ubuntu v20 and the desktop is ubuntu (in wayland the desktop sharing doesn't work)
summary: On linux it's a bag of problems

description: Don't know why so much negative reviews

no screen sharing option

description: Works perfect on my laptop, it doesn't ask me to log in repeatedly as other people.
summary: It has never given me any error

description: Very inconvienient

description: My organization invited me by my google email. The app redirects me to login to gmail to authenticate myself. This does not work since google does not comply with the built browser inside of this app. Please do update it.
summary: Can't Login if Invited from google email

description:
I have been using Teams from the snap installation for some time, and initially was working fine. Gradually it became to deteriorate, with first audio not working and then also with problems with screen share and incoming video. 
It seems that I fell into a version problem of the snap package, as described in https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/answers/questions/242731/can39t-get-sound-to-work-with-teams-in-ubuntu-2004.html 
By installing the package downloaded from the MS site all problems were resolved. The application works well for me.
It hangs at the login page
summary: Stop working when trying to login

description:
Aside from the fact that doesn't work, there's nothing wrong with it.

The web page Teams opens is completely unresponsive, even after I lower security.
m,lnlnklnklklnl;
it is very nice
Webcam doesn't work even after giving all kinds of permissions. And before anyone asks, my webcam itself is fine, I have checked.
I can't sign In, when trying it's restarts from begining

The app isn't that good actually. For the first time after downloading, it would be amazing. But when you open the app after logging into your system, it would start crashing. It wouldn't display anything but the cursor's movements represent something in there. I tried installing it for 3 times already. Not worth the time and effort.
summary: Wouldn't recommend at all! Waste of time and storage space!

description: I wasn't able to make call because it couldn't identify the mic attached to my CPU.

After entering org email ID, it says redirecting to org sign on page and appears to crash and restart the teams app, asking me to login once again.

If you try loggin in again, the same happens in a loop.

It seems it crashes for some reason while "redirecting".
works really well with Ubuntu 20, some features missing

This app is anything but ergonomic, absolutely not optimized (it uses ~33% of my i5-powered 3.5 GHz CPU!!), and includes some weird and unpractical features. I clearly switched to the webapp which much more usable, and I will clearly not come back to this unusable software.
hate it i hate
Unwanted teams insider logo on lock screen, even if the app is not running.
summary: Unwanted teams insider logo on lock screen

description: When this works, it works well. But most of the time I spend restarting and configuring the IO devices as its unable to detect these or just stops working altogether. I don't get this problem with other chat/messenger clients.
Bad. Says not signed up when my acc is signed up
summary: Bad. Says not signed up when my acc is signed up

description:
-problems with IO devices if you have multiple
-many MANY functions present in Win/web/android version is simply missing, like the reply to message function 
-resource heavy
-slow, incredibly slow. starts slowly, lags like hell
-no virtual backgrounds for calls

The effort from microsoft is near zero.
summary: barely usable. missing a lot of the features of android/win10/web

description: Lots of bugs, e.g. losing messages, replies, missing features (as compared with Windows), etc.
Slow down your computer
cannot share screen
This app does not support personal user account to login.
At worst when it hung, had to wait many minutes for the entire GUI to begin responding again. Just uninstalled it, but will try later because when it works, it's ok.
Huge and bloated as always, but missing features. It's the microsoft's way of telling you that if they can't spy freely on you thru windows, then they disloike you.

Chats and video calls work fine (including desktop sharing). Integration with o365 also works: you can read docs from onedrive/sharepoint, you can share presentations in video calls.

There are missed features if compare with macOS or windows versions:
- no background in video call
- no windows sharing option
summary: Works well for corp accounts. Some webcam features are missed

description: Garbage. Just purely garbage.

"Installed it, made a MS account, couldn't login with this app "Someone has already set up Teams for your organization" your missing out"

MS has really done it, made an application that will only work with a PAID subscription on an opensource free platform.
Disconnects and logs you out after 5 to 10 minutes.
In general the application is fine, a little slow sometimes but the biggest problem is that it does not keep the session, every time you close the application you have to re-enter the credentials
summary: Works a little slow but overall very good

description: The bar has been set with Slack. Teams tries to go it's own way and falls on it's face.
This is worse than the worse virus

- Status keeps changing to away or offline, even though I'm not.
- Notifications about someone being "available" will often randomly pop-up
- not all features in group-calls are available

Only tested with a business account.
Application crashing randomly in background and if in the call the defenitly wiill crash .
graphically unuseable

Screen share stopped working 2 weeks ago.

Audio started to get wonky around the same time. It does not use my default device, and randomly changes devices with each call.

These need fixed!
summary: Screenshare does not work...but did. Audio is sketchy

description: Fix it ASAP!!
summary: Screen sharing is not available now

description:
I use Ubuntu 22.04 LTS since four months and I tried some versions of Teams for Linux and many "fixes/solutions" from their official forum. Not a single one works properly.

When it does launch the calendar and meeting participation work, but it is absolutely impossible to share the screen or a single window. 
Only black screens are displayed when trying to select. An absolutely neccesssary, most important feature just doesn't work. I have to use Brave, but even that crashes regularly when quitting from sharing or sharing from others (Chrome doesn't work screen sharing, only single windows). 

Also it crashes randomly or doesnt start/login not possible.

Die Grundfunktionen sind vorhanden. Die Webapplikation ist deutlich besser und hat einen größen Funktionsumfang als die Desktop-App für Ubuntu.
Daher ist es für mich sinnlos die Desktop-App zu installieren.
startet jedes Mal, obwohl verstellt, lässt sich nicht wegklicken, funktioniert nicht. Unfassbar nervig
ubuntu stürzt ab

Nach mehreren Instanzen der Anmeldung erscheint die Meldung "Sie sind noch nicht bei Teams", man solle sich registrieren. Dann wird man an den Browser weitergeleitet. Wenn man die Registrierung mit allem Drum und Dran absolviert hat und im Browser schon aufgefordert wird, andere einzuladen, kommt man in der App "Insiders" immer noch nicht weiter als bis zur Meldung "Sie sind noch nicht bei Teams..."
Nach Installation und Login wird eine Registrierung für Teams verlangt, die geht über den Browser. Trotz Registrierung funktioniert Team für Linux trotzdem nicht.
summary: Anmeldung erforderlich, geht aber trotzdem nicht

description:
Funktioniert wie auf Windows, machmal sogar besser, da ich auf Windows manchmal die Aufgaben Sektion nicht funktioniert.
Nie abgestürtzt, nie Probleme.
Zumindest bei mir

Nach Installationen Regristiert man sich normal mit seinen Konto. Bis dahin funktioniert auch noch alles, aber dann möchte Teams das man sich regristriert, obwohl ich schon ein Teams Konto habe, dass auch auf anderen Geräten funktioniert. Ich habe mich trotzdem versucht zu regristieren, aber am Ende wird man wieder auf das Programm zurück geleitet, wo steht das man sich regristieren soll. Ich hoffe das, dass Problem schnell gefixt wird, da es ja kein einzelfall ist, wenn man durch die Rezenssionen guckt und Teams vorallem in der jetzigen Zei mit Covid-19 sehr wichtig ist.
Installiert, angemeldet und funktioniert wie es soll. MS-Programme unter Linux lauffähig, wer hätte dies vor ein paar Jahren noch gedacht.
Trying to login as guest to some organisation -> looping and falling back to the welcome screen. Works on windows, not on Ubuntu 20.04, poor.

Wiedermal eine absolute Dreckssoftware von Microsoft. Verschachtelt bis ins letzte Detail, alles muss man sich zusammensuchen. Chats, Anrufe etc. sind überall verteilt, nirgendwo gibt es einfach eine simple Übersicht wo man die Kommunikation mit einem Kollegen komplett sehen kann.

Die eigene Sortierung der app ist komplett unlogisch und lässt wichtige Gruppen immer am schnellsten in der Versenkung verschwinden.

Die Chat-Historie scrollt nicht richtig sondern springt beim scrollen immer nach zum neuesten Eintrag. Warum? Wer will das?

Zwischen Workspaces wechseln ist ein Ding der Unmöglichkeit weil Teams sofort danach neustartet und wieder in den Standardspace wechselt.

Und die Audio-Probleme: Einfach die verdammten Sytemeinstellungen zu übernehmen war wohl zu schwer? Stattdessen eine beschissene in-App Geräteverwaltung die kein Headset erkennt das *nach* dem Starten der App angeschlossen wurde. Bei einer App die mit dem System startet! Und was Teams dir als verwendetes Gerät anzeigt ist ihm in Wahrheit egal, es nimmt einfach irgendwas und man muss vor jedem Anruf 10 Minuten rumkonfigurieren damit es das macht was in Ubuntu eigentlich schon eingestellt war.

Dreckssoftware, es gibt viele bessere am Markt, z.B. Slack.

Ein Auskunftsersuchen nach Artike 15 DSGVO konnte von meiner "Organisation" nicht rechtzeitig beantwortet werden. Einzelne Nachrichten wollte ich schon löschen lassen. Die Nachrichten waren für mich aber noch sichtbar… Nicht meine Definition von Löschung…
summary: Schon allein der Datenschutz ist eine absolute Panne…

description: Funktioniert alles reibungslos. Chat, Vieo, Telefonie passt alles. Videohintergrund ausblenden wäre noch schön, wenn diese Funktion nachgereicht wird.

Can't update my office laptop to 22.04 because none of the Teams releases still aren't compatible with 22.04 which has webcam support. Do Microsoft really want to force us using Windows? 
This will not happen.

funciona bien pero ... 

No puedo ceder el control en una video llamada

Y ahora en la nueva version de ubuntu, aunque este abierto el programa lo marca como que esta cerrado asi que si quiero cambiar de pantalla y luego regresar, debo abrirlo de nuevo cada vez, es tedioso
La he usado para clases en linea y me parece muy eficiente, sin problemas o fallos graves.
En Windows tiene la opción de crear Subgrupos, es decir, salas virtuales separadas para hacer equipos con los alumnos, estaría muy bien que la pusieran también para Ubuntu.
summary: No tiene todavia la opción para crear Subgrupos

description: Cuando ingreso a la cuenta institucional, y quiero ingresar a una donde estoy como invitado me redirecciona de nuevo a la institucional.
summary: Sin acceso a cuentas de invitado

description: Ni de lejos estable pero funciona lo justo para ir tirando
El problema principal que tengo es con el audio el microfono deja de escucharse y el audio, el microfono no da señales de audio sin motivo aparente
No es la última versión. Se lagea
no se si fue la actualizaciòn o que isntalè el controlador de pavucontrol pero ahora me funciona ok
summary: Funciona muy bien en ubuntu impish indri

description: faltan algunas opciones como la de cambiar el fondo en las videoconferencias, pero de manera general funciona bastante bien
desde la actualizacion version ubuntu 22.04, deja de tener la opcion compartir pantalla
Con la actualización de ubuntu 22.04 no sale disponible la opción de compartir pantalla, incluso desde el navegador firefox solo sale la opción de usar la aplicación.

sudo vi /etc/gdm3/custom.conf

descomentar la linea :  waylandEnable=false

y lsto podras compartir pantalla en linux 22.04
summary: Ahora SI puedes COMPARTIR PANTALLA en MICROSOFT TEAMS

Application fonctionnelle, remplie son job.
